content.rendered:
Leadership Lessons to Level Up Your Career

Want to be a better version of yourself at work? These self-paced lessons will teach you the essential leadership skills for performing at your natural best.

All courses are exclusively available as part of Simon’s Optimism Library subscription.

Explore The Optimism Library

Signature Courses

Build leadership, confidence, and purpose—all at your own pace in The Optimism Library.

The Art Of Presenting With Simon

Discover Simon’s techniques to captivate your audience with confidence.

1.5 hrs | Taught by: Simon

USD $250.00

Learn More

Find Your WHY with Simon

Embrace a purpose-driven life and discover your WHY.

2 hrs + | Taught by: Simon

USD $250.00

Learn More

How to Handle Conflict at Work

Cultivate better connections at work and in life and excel in team dynamics.

1.5 hrs | Taught by Dr. Sara Kuburic

USD $250.00

Learn More

A Navy SEAL’s Guide to High Performance

Sharpen your leadership skills and build trusting teams.

1.5 hrs | Taught by: Simon and former Navy SEAL Rich Diviney

USD $250.00

Learn More

How to Be the Leader People Actually Trust (And Maybe Even Love)

Master the psychological skills that inspire others to contribute.

~2 Hours (34 bite-size modules, ~4 minutes each) | Taught by: Zach Mercurio and Simon

USD $250.00

Learn More

Encuentra Tu PORQUÉ con Simon

Embrace a purpose-driven life and discover your WHY, now in Spanish.

2 hrs + | Taught by: Simon

USD $99.00

Learn More

The Optimism Library

All Simon’s content in one place, for one price. The Library includes:

  • Quarterly Live Sessions with Simon
  • Simon’s most impactful lessons
  • 24/7 access to 250+ online lessons
  • And so much more

Try The Optimism Library for two weeks, risk-free.

If we can’t help you solve your problems or advance your dreams, it’s on us.

$24.99/month

($299.00 billed annually)

Get Started

Team-Building Programs

Simon created self-paced sessions to help your team improve collaboration, establish trust, and foster unity. Explore the programs here.

Unleash Your Infinite Mindset

Your team will learn how one small shift in thinking can have an outsized impact on your business.

Taught by: Simon Sinek

USD $999 for up to 20 participants

Learn More

The Art of Creating Fiercely Loyal Customers

How Unreasonable Hospitality can energize your team and revolutionize your business.

Taught by: Will Guidara

USD $999 for up to 20 participants

Learn More

Private 1:1 Sessions

Connect directly with one of Simon’s Optimist Instructors who can guide you on your journey of personal and professional growth.

WHY 1:1

This is a safe and trusting space to help guide you through the process of discovering your WHY.

Taught by: Optimist Instructor

USD $1,500

Learn More

Downloadables

Elevate your career with these expertly crafted guides.

Golden Circle for Individuals

Use Simon’s model as a guide for your journey to purpose and fulfillment.

Digital Download

USD $13.00

Digital Download

Simon offers actionable advice for leaders, millennials themselves, and parents.

Digital Download

How to write a cover letter that clearly states who you are and how you can advance the greater purpose of the organization.

Digital Download

Stand Out in the Job Market: Interview Tips

Essential tips on how to increase your efficacy during interviews to land a job you love.

Digital Download

USD $13.00

Stand Out in the Job Market: Resume

How to write a CV that clearly states who you are, what you do, and WHY you do what you do.

Digital Download

Stand Out in the Job Market: The Complete Guide

Everything you need to find a job that allows you to end every single day feeling fulfilled by the work you do.
